column5: Wow, they are so neat, trying to decide which one I want for my background  Very cool,  Joey
You just give these away?!?!?!? I mean Thanks, but who those have to be worth something to someone.  How do they look on a canvas of some kind?  Thanks for sharing

printed on canvas. they look great. i have one, and gave one to my mom and brother for xmas. i do this for fun and if i charged it would be too much like work only takes an hour or so to compose. sometimes takes 3 days to render though
